text: Neville Lederle (25 September 1938 â€“ 17 May 2019) was a South African racing driver. He raced in two Formula One World Championship Grand Prix. His two F1 appearances were in the and South African Grand Prix. He scored a single F1 championship point. He was born in Theunissen, Orange Free State. Lederle died at his home in Knysna on 17 May 2019, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Formula One drivers Category:South African racecar drivers
title: Neville Lederle
